[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/2665288.png” bottom_divider_style=”wave2″ bottom_divider_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Network Security Solutions In South India, INDIA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]An efficient network and a good security is the backbone of an IT infrastructure. To have foremost solutions regarding your IT concerns and problems is the most practical way to procure an eminent IT infrastructure. FixLab strives to provide methodical Network security solutions in South India, which enables our clients to chisel great business success. We guarantee support of professional network security solutions in South India to ensure the highest rate of network uptime and spectacular network service.

We prioritize customer satisfaction by building trust in our IT service. We are worth your partnership to provide the best Security solution in South India with Firewalls, Virus protection, intrusion detection and protection, and Information security management. As the best IT support in South India, we emphasize quality service and our client’s security. We sketch your network as capable of troubleshooting and composing the IT infrastructure for future growth with complete resolution.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(0,168,190,0.09)” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”3px||7px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why Network Security is Essential For Business in South India, INDIA?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As a global hub, South India and all over INDIA face a rising threat of cyberattacks, making robust network security vital for businesses across the INDIA. At FixLab , we provide advanced network security solutions that protect your sensitive data from unauthorized access, ensuring your business stays compliant with strict regulatory standards and avoids costly legal penalties.

Our solutions not only safeguard your data but also enhance the reliability of your systems by preventing disruptions caused by cyber threats. This ensures seamless business operations and increased productivity. By prioritizing network security, you demonstrate a strong commitment to protecting customer information—building trust, and fostering lasting relationships.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why Choose Our Network Security Solutions in South India, INDIA?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We understand the complexity of modern cyber threats and tailor our solutions to meet your specific needs. Our experienced professionals ensure your network is secure, resilient, and always protected against evolving risks.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”Customized Security Strategies” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

At FixLab , we don’t believe in a one-size-fits-all approach. We assess your IT network’s needs and provide custom solutions that fit your specific requirements, budget, and industry standards.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Firewall & Intrusion Prevention” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

We specialize in implementing robust firewalls that offer continuous monitoring and real-time threat management, ensuring that no unauthorized access compromises your network. With our cutting-edge technology and proactive approach, your business remains secure 24/7.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Compliance & Risk Management” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Many industries in the INDIA have strict data protection regulations. Network security measures help organizations meet these requirements and avoid  fines or legal repercussions.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”Advanced Threat Detection & Prevention” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our IDPS(Intrusion Detection and Prevention Systems) solutions detect, prevent, and respond to malicious activities, safeguarding your network from both internal and external threats.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Data Encryption & Secure Access” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Data encryption is a security technique that converts information into a coded format, known as ciphertext, which can only be deciphered by individuals who have the correct key or password.

Various encryption methods exist, but the three most common and widely used are Symmetric Encryption, Asymmetric Encryption, and Hashing.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Reduced Downtime” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#229DD1” closed_toggle_background_color=”#0C71C3″ toggle_icon=”G||divi||400″ open_toggle_icon=”F||divi||400″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”0px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cyberattacks can cause costly downtime and lost revenue. Network security helps prevent these attacks and keeps your business operations running smoothly.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_color_top=”#229DD1” border_style_top=”dashed” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/network.jpg” alt=”network security solutions in South India,INDIA” title_text=”network security solutions” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”83%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Security Solution In South India

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]We provide aggregate solutions customizing your business requirements. Our network security solutions include quality products which will suffice your future needs.

Our Security solution in South India redefines us to be the best IT company in South India. It comprises of network security solutions for better network security for individuals and companies. It provides security to people who work from home, securing access to the company networks, and e-mail with Remote Access and Virtual Private Networks. We also serve solutions for reliant internet service protecting you from hackers, virus and worms with efficient network security and firewalls. Our solutions ensure end-to-end security to your networks.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/banner-about-us-1.png” background_size=”contain” custom_padding=”48px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FEATURES WE OFFER

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1”][et_pb_blurb title=”SWITCHES” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

* UNMANAGED SWITCHES
* SMART MANAGED SWITCHES
* FULLY MANAGED SWITCHES
* CLOUD MANAGED SWITCHE

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”ROUTERS” alt=”settings” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

* ROUTER WITH FIREWALL
* ROUTER WITH VIRTUAL PRIVATE
NETWORK (VAN)
* ROUTER WITH INTERNET PROTOCOL

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”PDU’S” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

* NON-INTELLIGENT RACK PDU’S
* INTELLIGENT RACK PDU’S
